Localization.Name: Greycat Industrial
Localization.Description: A trusted manufacturer of industrial tools since 2337, the company’s extensive line of industrial equipment and armor make it one of the most respected brand names around. Greycat has remained a UEE staple for centuries thanks to their streamlined-yet-inventive designs, exacting safety standards, and a diverse product line.

English.Name: Greycat Industrial
English.Description: A trusted manufacturer of industrial tools since 2337, the company’s extensive line of industrial equipment and armor make it one of the most respected brand names around. Greycat has remained a UEE staple for centuries thanks to their streamlined-yet-inventive designs, exacting safety standards, and a diverse product line.

Localization.Name: OreBit Mining Attachment
Localization.Description:
MUST BUY BASE MULTI-TOOL TO USE: "Pyro RYT Multi-Tool"

Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Multi-Tool Attachment
Class: Mining

The OreBit attachment turns Greycat's Pyro RYT Multi-Tool into a handheld mining machine. It can scan rocks to find worthwhile deposits and then liberate the lode with its powerful mining laser. Next time you're planetside, be sure you bring this attachment or risk leaving easy credits behind.
